name: TMF
description: TMF provide employee, financial and legal administration so that firms can invest and operate safely around the world. TMF Group is a single global team with over 10,000 colleagues in 125 offices across 86 jurisdictions, covering 92% of world GDP and 95% of FDI inflow. TMF bring common culture and ways of working, investing heavily in our people and platform to provide a high level of quality and security to our clients. We exist to give clients a global solution to what otherwise requires many local providers, each with their individual operational complexity and risk. TMF clients include the majority of the Fortune Global 500, FTSE 100 and top 300 private equity firms. We see ourselves as a partner to them, keeping them on top of complex rules and regulations in the countries where they are active.

Highlights.name: Capital markets
Highlights.description: TMF Group provides services to support companies with their capital markets activities, such as IPOs, secondary offerings, and debt issuance.

Highlights.name: Global entity management
Highlights.description: TMF Group helps businesses with the incorporation and management of their subsidiaries around the world.

Highlights.name: Accounting and tax
Highlights.description: TMF Group helps businesses with a variety of accounting and tax services, including bookkeeping, financial reporting, tax compliance, and tax advisory.

enhanced_description: TMF Group offers comprehensive global administration services, encompassing employee, financial, and legal aspects. This includes specialized support in payroll processing, benefits administration (both software and services), and compensation management. Beyond HR, TMF Group provides critical financial and legal support such as capital markets activities (e.g., IPOs, secondary offerings, debt issuance), global entity management (incorporation and subsidiary management), and a full suite of accounting and tax services (including bookkeeping, financial reporting, tax compliance, and advisory). With a vast global footprint of over 10,000 colleagues in 125 offices across 86 jurisdictions, TMF Group helps multinational firms streamline complex global operations, ensuring compliance with local rules and regulations and mitigating operational complexity and risk. Their client base includes a significant portion of the Fortune Global 500, FTSE 100, and top private equity firms, positioning TMF as a strategic partner for global expansion and ongoing compliance.
